answers.question: Telegram Handle We Can Use To Contact You
Link to your Public Group Chat
Have you participated in a previous Gitcoin Grants Round? If so, please name the rounds or link the builder profile associated with previous rounds

answers.answer: Web3GPT is an AI-powered platform simplifying smart contract development and deployment across multiple EVM chains. It eliminates the complexity of Solidity coding, IDE setup, and manual contract verification. Developers of all skill levels can generate, deploy, and verify contracts through natural language prompts. Over 250 AI-generated contracts have already been deployed and auto-verified, addressing inefficiencies in onboarding, development speed, and multi-chain deployments.
answers.question: Provide a brief overview of your tool, library, or framework. What specific problem or inefficiency in the development process does it address?

answers.answer:
Reduces technical barriers by enabling contract creation via natural language, removing the need for Solidity expertise.
Increases deployment efficiency with automated verification and IPFS upload.
Supports major EVM testnets (Sepolia, Arbitrum, Optimism, Base, Polygon, etc.).
Provides specialized AI agents (e.g., OpenZeppelin 5.0, CTF Agent) that enforce security best practices and help identify vulnerabilities.
Metrics: 276+ smart contract deployments, 650% increase in page views (50,653 views), 17,422 visitors.
answers.question: How does your project reduce development barriers, improve efficiency, or enhance the security of Web3 projects? Please provide specific examples or metrics if available.

answers.answer:
276 smart contracts deployed and verified across multiple EVM chains.
200+ monthly active users (chatting and connected with Github)
17,422 unique visitors, 50,653 page views over the past year.
1.2K+ referrals from GitHub, indicating strong developer interest.
Community engagement across India, USA, and Philippines, with 63% desktop and 36% mobile users.
Integration with Blockscout, IPFS, and OpenZeppelin showing adoption of widely respected Web3 standards.
answers.question: Describe the current usage and support for your tool within the developer community. This could include GitHub stars, downloads, or testimonials from developers.

answers.answer:
Roadmap:

Q2 2025: Build APIs for developers and AI Agents to deploy smart contracts via MCP, Eliza, and Goat SDK standards.
Q2-Q3 2025: Launch Web3GPT Agent tools enabling:
Deployment of Web3 agents to Telegram.
On-chain tool integrations.
Cross-framework contract deployments via external agents.
Q3 2025: Hire a dedicated community manager for social media, developer outreach, onboarding, and technical support (actively hiring).
Throughout 2025: Scale infra and cover monthly $250+ costs for inference, hosting, and blockchain interaction.
answers.question: Outline your project's roadmap and how the grant funds will be used to achieve your development goals.

For any project deploying smart contracts on blockchain networks, please list all your deployer addresses and their corresponding blockchain networks. Use this format for each entry: [deployer_address], [chain_id]â€”for example, 0x123abc..., 42161 (This represents a deployer address on the Arbitrum network). Please include a separate line for each unique deployer address and blockchain combination.

project.title: Web3GPT
project.description:
# Web3GPT

Web3GPT is a developer tool designed to simplify the process of writing and deploying smart contracts, especially for those new to the Web3 ecosystem

## Features

- Deploy contracts with no wallet or IDE required.  Gas sponsored on testnet.

- Automated contract verification.

- IPFS repository generated and pinned for each deployment.

- Deploy to 7 EVM testnets with instant BlockScout verification.

- Hands on, interactive Solidity learning experience.

Web3GPT has been free to use & open source since launch.  40+ GH forks, 80+ stars,  200+ monthly active users, 2,000 unique visitors, 250+ AI assisted smart contract deployments.
